00008 #include <blond/constants.h>
00009 #include <blond/input_parameters/GeneralParameters.h>
00010 #include <numeric>
00011 
00012 GeneralParameters::GeneralParameters(
00013     const uint _n_turns, f_vector_t& _ring_length, f_vector_2d_t& _alpha,
00014     const uint _alpha_order, f_vector_2d_t& _momentum,
00015     const particle_type _particle, ftype user_mass, ftype user_charge,
00016     const particle_type _particle2, ftype user_mass_2, ftype user_charge_2,
00017     const uint number_of_sections) {
00018 
00019     this->particle = _particle;
00020     this->particle_2 = _particle2;
00021     this->n_sections = number_of_sections;
00022 
00023     if (particle == proton) {
00024         mass = constant::m_p * constant::c * constant::c / constant::e;
00025         charge = 1;
00026     } else if (particle == electron) {
00027         mass = constant::m_e * constant::c * constant::c / constant::e;
00028         charge = -1;
00029     } else if (particle == user_input) {
00030         mass = user_mass;
00031         charge = user_charge;
00032     } else {
00033         dprintf("ERROR: Particle type not recognized!");
00034         exit(-1);
00035     }
00036 
00037     if (particle_2 == none) {
00038         ;
00039     } else if (particle_2 == proton) {
00040         mass2 = constant::m_p * constant::c * constant::c / constant::e;
00041         charge2 = 1;
00042     } else if (particle == electron) {
00043         mass2 = constant::m_e * constant::c * constant::c / constant::e;
00044         charge2 = -1;
00045     } else if (particle == user_input) {
00046         mass2 = user_mass_2;
00047         charge2 = user_charge_2;
00048     } else {
00049         dprintf("ERROR: Second particle type not recognized!");
00050         exit(-1);
00051     }
00052 
00053     this->n_turns = _n_turns;
00054     this->momentum = _momentum;
00055     this->alpha_order = _alpha_order - 1;
00056     this->alpha = _alpha;
00057     this->ring_length = _ring_length;
00058     this->ring_circumference =
00059         std::accumulate(ring_length.begin(), ring_length.end(), 0.0);
00060     this->ring_radius = ring_circumference / (2 * constant::pi);
00061 
00062     if (n_sections > 1) {
00063         // TODO do some things inside here
00064         // Should ask danilo about this
00065         // Danilo told me we could skip this for now
00066     }
00067 
00068     this->gamma.resize(n_sections, f_vector_t(n_turns + 1));
00069     this->beta.resize(n_sections, f_vector_t(n_turns + 1));
00070     this->energy.resize(n_sections, f_vector_t(n_turns + 1));
00071     this->kin_energy.resize(n_sections, f_vector_t(n_turns + 1));
00072 
00073     const ftype masssq = mass * mass;
00074 
00075     for (uint i = 0; i < n_sections; ++i) {
00076         for (uint j = 0; j < n_turns + 1; ++j) {
00077             const ftype momentumsq = momentum[i][j] * momentum[i][j];
00078             this->beta[i][j] = std::sqrt(1 / (1 + (masssq / momentumsq)));
00079             this->gamma[i][j] = std::sqrt(1 + (momentumsq / masssq));
00080             this->energy[i][j] = std::sqrt(masssq + momentumsq);
00081             this->kin_energy[i][j] = energy[i][j] - mass;
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     t_rev.resize(n_turns + 1, 0);
00086 
00087     for (uint i = 0; i < n_sections; ++i)
00088         for (uint j = 0; j < n_turns + 1; ++j)
00089             t_rev[j] += ring_length[i] / (beta[i][j] * constant::c);
00090 
00091     cycle_time.resize(n_turns);
00092     cycle_time[0] = 0;
00093     for (uint i = 1; i < n_turns; ++i)
00094         cycle_time[i] = t_rev[i] + cycle_time[i - 1];
00095 
00096     f_rev.resize(n_turns + 1);
00097     for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns + 1; ++i)
00098         f_rev[i] = 1 / t_rev[i];
00099 
00100     omega_rev.resize(n_turns + 1);
00101     for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns + 1; ++i)
00102         omega_rev[i] = 2 * constant::pi * f_rev[i];
00103 
00104     if (alpha_order > 3) {
00105         dprintf(
00106             "WARNING: Momentum compaction factor is implemented only up to 2nd "
00107             "order");
00108         alpha_order = 3;
00109     }
00110     this->eta_0.resize(n_sections, f_vector_t(n_turns + 1));
00111     this->eta_1.resize(n_sections, f_vector_t(n_turns + 1));
00112     this->eta_2.resize(n_sections, f_vector_t(n_turns + 1));
00113     eta_generation();
00114 }
00115 
00116 GeneralParameters::~GeneralParameters() {}
00117 
00118 void GeneralParameters::eta_generation() {
00119     _eta0();
00120     if (alpha_order > 0)
00121         _eta1();
00122     if (alpha_order > 1)
00123         _eta2();
00124     if (alpha_order > 2)
00125         dprintf(
00126             "WARNING: Momentum compaction factor is implemented only up to 2nd "
00127             "order");
00128 }
00129 
00130 void GeneralParameters::_eta0() {
00131     // eta_0 = new ftype[n_sections * (n_turns + 1)];
00132     for (uint i = 0; i < n_sections; ++i)
00133         for (uint j = 0; j < n_turns + 1; ++j)
00134             eta_0[i][j] = alpha[i][0] - 1 / (gamma[i][j] * gamma[i][j]);
00135     // dprintf("eta_0[0] = %lf\n", eta_0[0]);
00136 }
00137 
00138 void GeneralParameters::_eta1() {
00139     // eta_1 = new ftype[n_sections * (n_turns + 1)];
00140     for (uint i = 0; i < n_sections; ++i)
00141         for (uint j = 0; j < n_turns + 1; ++j)
00142             eta_1[i][j] =
00143                 3 * beta[i][j] * beta[i][j] / (2 * gamma[i][j] * gamma[i][j]) +
00144                 alpha[i][1] - alpha[i][0] * eta_0[i][j];
00145 }
00146 
00147 void GeneralParameters::_eta2() {
00148     // eta_2 = new ftype[n_sections * (n_turns + 1)];
00149     for (uint i = 0; i < n_sections; ++i)
00150         for (uint j = 0; j < n_turns + 1; ++j) {
00151             const ftype betasq = beta[i][j] * beta[i][j];
00152             ftype gammasq = gamma[i][j] * gamma[i][j];
00153             eta_1[i][j] = -betasq * (5 * betasq - 1) / (2 * gammasq) +
00154                           alpha[i][2] - 2 * alpha[i][0] * alpha[i][1] +
00155                           alpha[i][1] / gammasq +
00156                           alpha[i][0] * alpha[i][0] * eta_0[i][j] -
00157                           3 * betasq * alpha[i][0] / (2 * gammasq);
00158         }
00159 }
